website_summaries.verdict: A versatile color story of 12 matte eyeshadow shades from the Peaches and Cream Collection.
pros: These warm, peachy shades feature exclusive comfort-matte technology for saturated color that glides on smoothly and is easy to blend
Layout of the palette makes creating flattering looks simple, even for less experienced users
cons: Users with sensitive skin may have issues with the fragrance

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite palette ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite palette ever, and I have A LOT. The colors are more vivid than the pictures can show. They are very pigmented and blend so well. The smell isn't as strong as I was expecting. I don't mind it. Smells like peaches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Good Colors
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shadow and nice colors. I like the way these shadows go on and how they look through out the day more than Urban Decay and Tarte. I bought the Too Faced - White Peach as well and I honestly prefer it. I liked having a few sparkly colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: BelmintBetty

customer_reviews.title: Best Peachy Eyeshadows!
customer_reviews.text: Love these eyeshadows! Peachy colors are so difficult to find and there are the absolute BEST!
customer_reviews.author: David Clem/Wanda Swartling

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend Approved !
customer_reviews.text: The Honest Review Guy 2.0 Here: My girlfriend loves this pallet. That’s all she’s happy lol. Wanna make your girlfriend happy ? Here’s what you can buy for $50
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting, the peach smell isn’t all that prevalent but the shadows are perfect and pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Calvary

customer_reviews.title: Just Peachy
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Looks great. Very blendable. Great for stocking stuffer. :)
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful selection of colors
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this pallet! The colors are rich, intense & compliment my skin tone perfectly. Blend out so beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Blythe Manor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tin container very disappointed. By the way I was also told I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife’s birthday. Sadly was told this is fake. Cheap tin container very disappointed. By the way I was also told I over paid on here.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Came in bad condition
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Ordered this as a gift, came in bad condition. Knew it was damaged before even opening the box, powder everywhere. If it had been for me I wouldn't be so upset, but I can't give this as a gift. This review is more about the condition, not the product. I love too faced pallets, and this one does have that light fresh peach scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality pigmant
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked to see how strong the pigments are in this eye shadow palette. Pleased enough to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Palette is great! I bought it at Sephora for $15 less than this post....
customer_reviews.author: Heather L

product_meta.title: Too Faced Just Peachy Mattes Eye Shadow Palette
product_meta.description: Create The Perfect Look With Our Trendsetting, Cruelty-Free Makeup. Shop Now! Beautiful & Long Lasting. Free Shipping. Totally Cruelty-Free. Types: Eye Shadow Palettes, Long Lasting Mascara, Eyeliner, Foundation, Lipstick, Bronzer, Primer, Lip Gloss, Blush, Concealer.
